summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1666, for the improvement of Madison Street, in the City of Seattle, from Third Avenue to Sixth Avenue, by paving the same with sandstone blocks, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and including such sewers and water mains, and their appurtenances, as may be necessary for the proper sewerage, water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 17604, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
